electrode_id.description: Identifier for the electrode. Corresponds to the electrode number on the probe.

probe_id.description: Identifier for the probe to which the electrode belongs.

location.description: Anatomical location of the electrode, often referring to a specific brain area.

hemisphere.description: Hemisphere in which the electrode is located.

connector_aligned_id.description: Identifier for the aligned connector pin associated with this electrode.

insulation.description: Type of insulation material used for the electrode.
